ygData.subject: Combat song choices
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey everyone... Just curious how many of us would choose to sing Berserker Cressendo over Verses of Celerity while wielding weapons...and if you are using a
ygData.messageBody:
Hey everyone...
Just curious how many of us would choose to sing Berserker Cressendo over Verses of Celerity while wielding weapons...and if you are using a brass horn for this, what other songs best compliment it?
My normal melee compliment is weapons and twisting Verses of Celerity/psalm of cooling and chains (sometimes chant of flame because I like people's reactions to the %T begins to chant message). Very curious about what other, mid 40s bards sing before getting Nivs/chords of cessation and shield of song...
Tyunes of Rodcet Nife
Finally singing the Dirge



---------------------------------
Do You Yahoo!?
Yahoo! Auctions $2 Million Sweepstakes - Got something to sell?

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
